pkgmetadata.longdescription: A python wrapper for the Proxmox 2.x API.Example usage:1) Create an instance of the prox_auth class by passing in theurl or ip of a server, username and password:a = prox_auth('vnode01.example.org','apiuser@pve','examplePassword')2) Create and instance of the pyproxmox class using the auth object as a parameter:b = pyproxmox(a)3) Run the pre defined methods of the pyproxmox class. NOTE: they all return data, usually in JSON format:status = b.getClusterStatus()For more information see https://github.com/Daemonthread/pyproxmox
